short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Botsuz hava sahası! Spam ve bot hesapları blok eder.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitter Bot and Spam Filter

Clean up your Twitter timeline by automatically filtering out known bot and spam accounts.

Key Features:
- Removes tweets from a curated list of bot and spam accounts
- Enhances your Twitter experience by focusing on genuine content
- Easy to enable or disable with a single click
- Lightweight and fast performance
- Respects user privacy - no data collection or external servers used. Everything is open-source.

How it works:
1. Install the extension
2. The filter is enabled by default, immediately cleaning up your timeline
3. Click the extension icon to toggle the filter on or off
4. Browse Twitter with a cleaner, more authentic feed

Perfect for users who want to reduce noise and focus on meaningful content in their Twitter timeline.

Future updates:
- Language-based filtering options to further customize your experience
- User-suggested additions to the bot/spam account list

Note: This extension filters the visible tweets based on a pre-defined list of known bot and spam accounts. It does not alter your Twitter account settings or affect your followers/following.

Improve your Twitter experience today by filtering out the noise and focusing on the content that matters to you!
